about_the_game:
MEET CYCLONES HEAD-ON!

No, this isn’t about twisters that take out trailer parks in the Midwest. We’re referring to Cybernetic Clones, deadly creations of an alien race bent on Earth’s conquest.

To add insult to injury, these CyClones are actually captured human beings transformed into flesh-steel monstrosities! As Earth’s defender armed to the teeth with the highest of hi-tech weaponry, you’re dying to jump into action.
No wonder: CyClones is a white-hot multi-media explosion from the 90s! It features everything that was cool at that time - full-motion videos, cinematics, digitized voices, sizzling sound effects and breath-taking music. Smooth scrolling, head-on perspective puts all the action right where you want it - in your face.

  • A streamlined interface allows for quick access to weapons and inventory - gameplay is fast and FUN!
  • Features intense full-motion video and cinematics from the 90s plus smooth scrolling and first-person perspective.
  • Digitized voices, sound effects and original music bring the action to life!
  • Multiple missions with variable difficulty settings give players of all experience levels a fair shot at CyClones.

content_descriptors.notes: CyClones is a game developed in 1994. According to official ratings from that time, It contains animated violence, blood, and gore. Might not be appropriate for all audiences.

name: CyClones

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: CyClones is a first-person shooter (FPS) classic from the 90s that challenges players to explore maze-like environments and take down flesh-steel monstrosities using an impressive arsenal of hi-tech weaponry.
